benefits.title: What the workshop is all about?
benefits.description: Our workshops are an initiative to channelize kids' screen time and creatively engage them. The kids learn to code a complete game/animation from start to finish during the workshop.

benefits.title: What we'll achieve?
benefits.description: The kids will learn the basics of block coding (Scratch), and also how to approach game/animation design and development.

benefits.title: Beginner friendly
benefits.description: We'll start from the very basics, and no prior coding experience, or knowledge is necessary to attend the workshop.

benefits.title: Learn from the best
benefits.description: The workshop will be conducted by our founders themselves. They love to interact with kids, and solving their doubts.
